ygData.subject: Re: me again hehe, (tomahawk 1h slasher)
ygData.msgSnippet: The Polished Granite Tomahawk is hard to come by. People have been offering 200pp for one. Now the whip you speak of is no more expensive than a store bought
ygData.messageBody:
The Polished Granite Tomahawk is hard to come by. People have been offering
200pp for one. Now the whip you speak of is no more expensive than a store
bought weapon (non-rusty). I got one for my bard for 25pp a while back and
a friend got one for 12pp. The lifetap only kicks in about every other
fight on average.

Bandor, Barbarian Warrior








anonymaste@... on 05/17/99 08:44:38 AM

Please respond to warriors_eq@onelist.com








To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

cc: (bcc: Terry Chlebek/DPT)



Subject: [warriors_eq] me again hehe, (tomahawk 1h slasher)









From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>

I was wondering, how common is the tomahawk in the pass?
How much cash should I pay for one?
Is there any other wep I should get instead?
atm im using a mino axe and I am sorta lookin for something new.
I read about that life stealin whip but am sure that a wep like that would
cost a fortune.

hope you can help me.

Vashi of solusek ro
